entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
